body.name: ASHATA Unlocked Android Smartphone Cellphone, 6.26in FHD Waterdrop Screen 2G 3G Net Mobile Phone, Camera Front 2MP Rear 2MP, 1GB+8GB+128GB Extended Memory, 1950mah Fast Charging (Black)

features: For Android Smartphone: The Cellphone with 6.26 inches full HD Waterdrop Screen. The new interactive design meets daily entertainment and daily use. As a famliy friends colleague staff.
Powerful Functions: Dual Card Dual Standby, Accurate Face Recognition, WIFI, GPS, Bluetooth, FM Radio, Calendar, Calculator, Voice Recorder, Video Recorder, etc

1GB RAM + 8GB ROM + 128GB Expanded Memory – Store more of your favorite apps, games and media with an expansive storage. Open apps quickly and smoothly. Professional manufacturing, stable performance and high reliability.
Dual Camera: Camera front 2MP (F/2.0 Aperture, Fixed Focal Length), rear 2MP ((color, F/1.8 Aperture, autofocus). Provides higher brightness, color vibrancy and sharpness of photos and videos.
Large Battery Capacity – Built‑in battery 1950mah, large battery capacity that can save you the trouble of insufficient power. All it takes is a short charge to get you ready for your day.
body.description: Excellent Smartphone NOTES ( Please Read Before Purchase! ): Please kindly note that the i12 Pro is designed as a affordable basic 2G/3G Cellphone. Verizon carrier card cannot be used. 4G and 5G cards can only use 3G networks and cannot use networks above 4G.The apps that can be installed must be compatible with the mobile phone for Android system 8.1. If the application version is at least compatible for Android 10.1, it cannot be used for Android in the lower version system.The phone should not be used in the charging process, easy to heat up. Package List: 1 x Phone 1 x Protect Cover 1 x Film 1 x Earphone 1 x Data Cable 1 x Manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Metal Intergrated Frame At ASHATA, our purpose is to provide innovative, high quality products that everyone can afford. Quality is the key! If for any reason, you don't like ASHATA's smartphones, please tell us and we will help you solve it. If you receive damaged goods, please tell us promptly, we will solve the problem for you as soon as possible! Excellent Smartphone NOTES ( Please Read Before Purchase! ): Please kindly note that the i12 Pro is designed as a affordable basic 2G/3G Cellphone. Verizon carrier card cannot be used. 4G and 5G cards can only use 3G networks and cannot use networks above 4G.The apps that can be installed must be compatible with the mobile phone for Android system 8.1. If the application version is at least compatible for Android 10.1, it cannot be used for Android in the lower version system.The phone should not be used in the charging process, easy to heat up. Package List: 1 x Phone 1 x Protect Cover 1 x Film 1 x Earphone 1 x Data Cable 1 x Manual

6.26 inch Large Screen The high definition large-screen smart phone allows you to experience a broader field of view and display more content, 19:9 narrower border, larger screen displaybring you a better visual feast, allowing you to enjoy and enjoy it more when playing games or watching videos. 1GB+8GB+128GB Expanded Memory Store more of your favorite apps, games and media with an expansive storage. Open apps quickly and smoothly. Professional manufacturing, stable performance and high reliability. 128GB expandable storage (The memory card is not included in the package) Quad Core CPU This Smartphone with SC7731E Quad-Core CPU Chip. Deep development based on the Android system, comfortable use experience, smooth operation. The phone should not be used in the charging process, easy to heat up.

2MP Rear Camera 2MP Rear Camera ((Color, F/1.8 Aperture, autofocus). Provides higher brightness, color vibrancy and sharpness of photos and videos. 2MP Front Camera 2MP Front Camera (F/2.0 Aperture. Provides higher brightness, color vibrancy and sharpness of photos and videos. Large Battery Capacity Built‑in battery 1950mah, large battery capacity that can save you the trouble of insufficient power. All it takes is a short charge to get you ready for your day.

GPS GPS positioning and navigation,to protect you and create indoor navigation function. the national super high 300 airports High-speed rail stations,shopping malls and other publi places. Dual Card Dual Standby Supports simultaneous use of Dual SIM Cards for data and phone calls or a micro SD card for data storage. (Does not work with AT&T SIM Cards) (Only support WCDMA850/2100, GSM4 Frequency Cellular Carrier) Face Recognition Accurate identification, bring you a science fiction experience！

Specification Item Type Smartphone Model IP12 PRO+ Screen Size 6.26in HD Full Fit for Waterdrop Screen Resolution 480x1014 Operating System for Android 8.1 Chip SC7731E Quad Core CPU Memory Storage 1GB + 8GB Storage Expansion Support maximum expansion 128GB memory card(not Include), support simultaneous installation of two SIM cards and a memory card(Not Included) SIM Card Type 3G (WCDMA850/2100, GSM4 frequency dual card dual standby, for NanoSIM card)(not Include) Front Camera 2MP, f/2.0 Aperture, Fixed Focal Length Rear Camera 2MP(Color, F/1.8 Aperture) Auto Focus Function Face Recognition, Wifi+BT+FM+GPS Interface 1 x 3.5mm, 1 x micro USB Battery 1950mah Li-ion Battery NOTE If you encounter problems that cannot be used, please tell us in time, and we will solve it for you in time.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It wasn't my kinda phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this phone to transfer my *Obama phone chip into. Yeah... Nope. This phone has been hollowed out so much that it has none of the apps or programs that you need to do really anything. I can't play games, make calls, send messages or use apps. The phone routinely opens things and then shuts them down within a few seconds and tells you your missing the background programs you need to run. It's completely frustrating. Unless you know how to reprogram a phone it's not worth your time. Which bites since it's really a pretty phone. But that it's only redeeming qualitiy.

reviews.reviewText: Could not get it switched over with my old android phone company says it’s not comparable with my phone carrier so I just bought a phone that I can’t use 😞
